title: Bradford one of cheapest cities to buy a house in UK
text:
Bradford is one of the most affordable cities to buy a house in the country, a report has found.
In Bradford homes cost around 4.4 times the average wage Credit: Press Association Houses in the city cost around 4.4 times the average salary, making it the third most affordable place to buy.
Whereas one of the least affordable cities is York, with house prices around seven and a half times average earnings.
The study, by Lloyds found that Oxford is the least affordable place to live.
The average house price in a UK city has surged by nearly a third over the last five years, with the average home costing Â£224,926 in 2017.
